title: Orc
entryLore: Orcs trace their creation to Gruumsh, a god who wandered the wild spaces of the Material Plane. This heritage grants them incredible endurance and a fierce determination that shines brightest when the odds are stacked against them.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: Take the [[dash_action|Dash]] action as a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]]. Gain PB [[temporary_hit_points|Temporary Hit Points]]. PB uses per Short/Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have [[darkvision|Darkvision]] with a range of 120 feet.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed, drop to 1 HP instead. Once per Long Rest.
